channel.title: [PI]Maze minigame help (IMPORTING a Timer's count)

item.title: [PI]Maze minigame help (IMPORTING a Timer's count)
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Where’s the code for the interface…

wich interface?, it get’s the interface from playerAssistant… ohhhh well. if i find the interface code in playerassistant and place it in Maze.java. then it would work?

EDIT: I tryed to add it another way around and it worked fine except that i have to write every count myself…

[code]public void Timer(final Client c) {
CycleEventHandler.getSingleton().addEvent(this, new CycleEvent() {
int count = 30;
@Override
public void execute(CycleEventContainer container) {
if (count == 30){
c.getMaze().sendFrame126(“Maze Minigame”, 6569);
c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
c.getMaze().sendFrame126(“Time left”+count, 6664);
c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
}

		if (count == 25){
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
		}
		
		if (count == 20){
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
		}
		
		if (count == 15){
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
		}
		
		if (count == 10){
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
		}
		
		if (count == 5){
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("", 6572);
		c.getMaze().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568);
		}

if (count == 0) {
c.isInMaze = false;
c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0);
c.getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.forcedChat(“i lost goddamit.”);
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
this.stop();
}
count–;
}
@Override
public void stop() {
}

}, 2);
}[/code]

@corpze wrote:

sk8rdude461:

c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time left ! "+count, 6664);

got this error:

src\server\model\minigames\Maze.java:94: error: non-static variable count cannot be referenced from a static context c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664); ^ src\server\model\minigames\Maze.java:99: error: non-static variable count cannot be referenced from a static context c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time left"+count, 6664); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .

item.title: [PI]Maze minigame help (IMPORTING a Timer's count)
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

hi guys ive reached far with this minigame, but i need your guy’s help…

i added this timer in Maze.java

[code]public void Timer(final Client c) {
CycleEventHandler.getSingleton().addEvent(this, new CycleEvent() {
int count = 30;
@Override
public void execute(CycleEventContainer container) {

  if (count == 15) {

c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.forcedChat(“15 units left.”);
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
this.stop();
}

if (count == 0) {
c.isInMaze = false;
c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
c.roomProgress = 100;
c.getPA().movePlayer(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0);
c.getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.forcedChat(“i lost goddamit.”);
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
this.stop();
}
count–;
}
@Override
public void stop() {
}

}, 2);
}[/code]

how do i make the “count” go in a c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Time left”+???+" !", 6664);?
and make it keep updating?
and the timer is starting, at 0 it teleports me to home and exits the mace

if (c.roomProgress < 0) { c.roomProgress = 0; c.getPA().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 6572); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time left "+?????+"!", 6664); c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568); } else { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Maze Minigame", 6569); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 6572); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time left "+?????+"!", 6664); c.getPA().walkableInterface(6568); } }
